comments.body:
can we have this as a separate test instead of combining with existing case?
Thanks.

The test is that the removeComments flag causes comments not to be emitted. So the point here is that there should be no comments in the javascript emitted for this test code. :edit: I have added some additional TypeScript code for which no comments should be emitted. /:edit:. Could you explain why this is a seperate test case.
